label: MASKS REQUIRED
description: business requires masks to enter, and shop

label: 6 FT APART
description: require customers to remain 6 feet apart at all times

label: DISINFECTION
description: regularly disinfect areas of the business that might have multiple contact with customers

label: TRAINED WORKERS
description: workers are trained to follow state recommended protocols for safety

label: LOW DENSITY
description: business never lets number of people in their space exceed the safe limit (based on square footage and other factors)

label: ADEQUATE SUPPLIES
description: business has supplies available for customoer use, like handsantizers, soap, masks.
